title: Shamanic Veigar skin concept
body:
Hey! Guess who's back with another Veigar skin concept (seriously I need to stop).
Here I was doodling around and came out with this little concept. I'm struggling to find a cool mask for him so if you have any idea, feel free to!
He would sacrifice the chicken on his staff to summon a lighting strike (his w).

https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/723/796/large/olivier-desiree-itteration.jpg?1520529631
He would sacrifice the chicken on his staff to summon a lighting strike (his w).

https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/723/840/large/olivier-desiree-spell.jpg?1520528734
(the colour is just a test)
https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/724/029/large/olivier-desiree-test-colo.jpg?1520529575
https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/723/811/large/olivier-desiree-recherche-2.jpg?1520528557
https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/723/971/large/olivier-desiree-recherche-1.jpg?1520529380

replies.body:
Your creativity for making Veigar concepts astounds me. This is a cool idea that I would definitely want. Keep up the good work.

Question: Have you tried making concepts for more champs than Veigar? I'm just curious to see what you'd have in mind for, IDK, {{champion:432}} as an example

Thank you very much ! Here you can see my Warring Kingdom Taliyah. https://www.artstation.com/artwork/lWKWV 
I also have lot of idea for other champs such as bard which has an interesting general shape to work with. I'm actually thinking about Captain Hook Thresh. :^)

Great concept and drawing! but sorry i had to

http://www.mobygames.com/images/shots/l/757631-crash-bandicoot-psp-screenshot-witch-doctor-s-mask-giving.jpg
Hahah you're not the only one coming out with this dw! :^D
{{champion:45}} : Is that a short joke?

instructions unclear, instead we made [ice/fire/robot] veigar skin.

-riot probably

this is really great
Hahah thank you!

It's not an ahri concept so I'll pass.
Lol jk jk but it definitely has me voting for it! 
He could have like tribal sounds when he recalls!
Hahah with friends we were thinking about him running after a chicken when he recalls trying to catch him!
The only thing I hear in my head when I see that is... patapatapatapon, ponponpatapon, chakachakapatapon, ponponpatapon.
This was the inspiration for the concept! (And that one Maokai skin)
as a veigar main i approve
If this gets released he'd need a kakamora chroma
Nice idea!
I think this is my favorite so far!
YEEEEEEEEEEEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
NEED MOAR POWER TO PROTEC DA QUEEN
This could be one of his line!
I'm game for this.
i take it back this is gold, needs other particles besides fire for AA/Q/R for clarity tho
Loving this skin! Would much rather prefer to see this skin than Omega Squad Veigar. :D
I think the ult should be a bit different. Maybe a head of a spirit animal?
That's nice! :o
seriously Super cool idea, but you should have meybe worked more with that veigars big hand what he is know like i that battle boss skin. meybe it should be another mask aswell :D
Maybe have like... a big shadow/necro-energy hand surrounding his normal hand?
Actually you're right, i went so much on thinking about the mask, I forgot the hand. I'll be working more on it next times!
I LOVE this SO much. Would love to see this as a legendary.
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/605/945/98d.gif
Very cool concept
thx!

Damn, why is this not in the game yet? I have never played Veigar, and I absolutely hate to play against him.
But this concept is amazing!
Woah thank you!

Only problem is the autoattack, Q, and R all look quite similar (though this is a common issue with Veigar).

Other than that it's quite good.
Someone suggested to do an elemental thing on spells, R = fire, Q = water, W = Thunder...

he nakey {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}} 

capi back at it again with the cutest designs
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
holy shit this could be almost final boss level good
#YES PLEASE AND MAKE IT LEGENDARY!
This isn't a shaman, this is a witch doctor...
Oh, rly? Sorry I didn't know, what is the difference?

ill pay €50 for that skin + a ward that fits the skin
If the ult could be him thowing a chicken would be amazing, that the skin would look amazing, cute and funny
i love your artstyle
Thank you !! :^D

No, Miss Fortune needs another skin... Obviously







































seriously thought, why riot
Aku Aku
